description: T1 - Cedar (Cedrus spp)	Reduce lateral spires only by approximately 1.5-2m back to within the natural line of the tree, to create a more balanced crown and give clearance from adjacent tree and buildings.Chinese privet (Ligustrum lucidum)	Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by approximately 2m, to tidy and contain.T2 - Chinese privet (Ligustrum lucidum)	Fell to ground level and remove all arisings, as tree is becoming too large for its location and is causing damage to the driveway. Client wishes to replant with something more suitable.T3 - Mimosa (Acacia dealbata)	Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by approximately 2-3m, to tidy and contain.T4 - Pittosporum	Fell to ground level and remove all arisings.and	To poison stump with EcoPlugs.T5 - Cedar (Cedrus spp)	Fell to ground level and remove all arisings.T6 - Smoke bush (Cotinus coggygria)	Fell to ground level and remove all arisings.and	To poison stump with EcoPlugs.T7 - Chusan palm (Trachycarpus fortunei)	Fell to ground level and remove all arisings
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
